answers.answer: The only time I have heard of it is when you may have preclampsia and they take the urin for 24 hours then test the proiten in it. If you have had high blood pressure or they seen some protein in the urin or if you are swelling. Do you have any of those symptom??

I took it because my urine tested postitive for protein. It tested to make your kidneys n liver are OK.  Also to make sure your not preclampsy. I pasted it!  Don't stress,  they just want to eliminate reasons y you're urine has protein
I'm doing it right now I felt tingly hands and feet and dizzy and did some blood test so I'm at the 24hr urine for precaution

I turned mine in yesterday. I'm going crazy because the lab said that my.doctor would have the results of that and my blood draw that day, but I still haven't heard. I'm hoping no news is good news.I had mine ordered because of small levels of protein in my urine and elevated blood pressure at my appointment
I get to turn mine in in 45 minutes yay lol
I am doing my second one for this pregnancy due to blood pressure.
I did one at 25 weeks as a baseline test. My doctor was worried that my pregnancy might lead to preeclampsia because of high blood pressure.

I had one when I was pregnant with my daughter. My blood pressure was high, but I didn't have preeclampsia. This pregnancy, Im at a new dr, they had me do one at 9 weeks just to get a baseline, so they know if anything goes up at all
Doing mine as well. Started this morning. Not fun.
I did one with my son.   I had high protein levels but my 24hr was fine.

I just got finished with doing mine and going to hand it in when my husband gets home from work. I got it ordered by the doctor that looked at my anatomy scan not my regular ob so I don't know why I had to do one because before the scan I had a regular check up and they said my urine was fine. I also had to get a comprehensive metabolic test done so hoping everything is ok.

question: Has anyone else ever had to do a 24 hour urine collection test? Im 13 weeks pregnant with my 4th child and ive never had to do this test before its got me kinda stressed.
title: 24 hour urine test
